document.full_text: a half-dozen u.s. industrial multinationals beat wall street earnings estimates and raised their full-year forecasts on strong performance in overseas markets and a rebound in u.s. auto and truck production, pushing share prices higher.
document.title: 3m, itw profits beat, industrials raise forecasts
lines_and_colors: a half-dozen u.s. industrial multinationals beat wall street earnings estimates and raised their full-year forecasts on strong performance in overseas markets and a rebound in u.s. auto and truck production, pushing share prices higher.
